author: Nicole Blackmore
title: 'I already draw a £45,000 police pension but still work - how can I top it up?'
text: I’ll make sure the pension freedoms work 'I already draw a £45,000 police pension but still work - how can I top it up?' Ask an Expert: A retired police officer plans to return to work and increase his retirement income. What are his options? Employer contributions are a valuable advantage of workplace pension schemes. Photo: Alamy
